me ha samana thathwaye awasana wyapruthiya wu mulu mahath manushya wargayagema janamaya wikethanaya kirimata awurudu 15 ka kalayak gathawana bawa saha ee sadaha awashya mudal ha sampath soya ganimata nohaki wana bawada mulin salakana lada namuth 1990 warshaye eya aarambha kara wasara 13 kin sarthaka lesa nima kara thibe.
sawasa kolambaa kotuwe pawathwena udghoshana pelapaliyata awi muwahath karanuwa aganuwarata adena sankramanika nuwarun danumwath kirima owuhu himidiriyema aarambha kara atha.
eda sampradayata anuwa lingikathwaya gana hangi hora katha kalath in warthamanaye boho aniyam sabandatha walata para kapenne ambausamiyan athara lingikathwaya gana wiwrutha bhawayak nathikama nisayi.

game katahari polgediyak kadaganna,lindak ihaganna witharak neme malageyak unama wala kapana wadetath gunadasa oone wenawa.ude indan rawenakan gameprabhu bhumikawa rangadakwana kalumahaththayata hamadama handakoreta kasippu bagayak oone.kasippu peme langata gihin eeka genath, emingamana magadi podi shot ekak eekenma katata halagena, aduwa purawanna agalkatakin wathura purawala eeka kalumahaththayata genath dena diliwariya kaleth me kiyana gunema thama.

meki dada bada gala nagala wadi una mage gawa sit eke.mekige eka athaka sinharaje podi eka wage hena boganwila palayak machan.eeke kolayi maluyi katuyi athuyi hondata hadila.anik athe machan kudeyi poth puropu kliyar bag ekakuyi.kare thawa sayid bag ekak.dan machan wadi unane. ara thadi malla mage ange, boganwila katu mage kane.mal oluwe.tikakinda koheda mekita eeka mitar une aa hondayi tho wagema tiyub layit kes ekak ahapanko ithin....meki ee gamana ane sori ane kiyala hena waraddak kala wage balmant ekak dala pale gaththa eha paththata.eelagata dan trayi karanawa ara kude bag ekata obaganna.ara wisala pale ekka ba.eeka bima thiyanneth na habayi.ee gamana pawu ne mama ithin pale tikakata gaththa thiyaganna.mekith hina wela ara thibuna latta lotta tika bag ekata obagena nidahase yanawa.dan machan pale mathaka na.math dan balan hitiya mokada karanne kiyala.

mathiwarana kramaya sanshodhanaya kirima.""me hara wena kisiwak sandahan kara natha.""ese nam janadhipathithumata ho eksath jathika pakshayata ho shri lanka nidahas pakshayata ho nawa wyawasthawak panawime janawaramak 2015/08/18 pasugiya maha mathiwaranaye di labi athida?""ewita 1972 wyawasthawe ho 1978 sandahan ayuru janathawa wisin dena lada balaya ha janawarama anuwa nawa wyawasthawak sampadanaya karana bawa sandahan kala hakida?""chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga janadhipathithumiyage palana samaye 2000/08/03 dina ewakata adhikarana, aandukrama, wyawastha katayuthu, janawargika katayuthu ha jathika eekabaddhatha amathyathuma saha mudal niyojya amathyathuma wana mahacharya ji. el. piris mathithuma wisin parlimenthuwata idiripath kala shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye aandukrama wyawasthawa parichchinna kota ee wenuwata wenath aandukrama wyawastha prathiyojanaya kirima sandaha wu panath ketumpatha sandaha janawaramak laba gaththe keseda? 1994 mathiwarana prakashanaye nawa wyawasthawak gana sandahanwa natha.thawada 2/3 kata janawaramak labuneda natha.""ema 2000 aandukrama wyawastha ketumpathe perawadana meseya.""aandukrama wyawastha swarupayen hebi uththarithara nithiyak padanam karagenarajyanushasanaye niyuktha aayathana shakthimath karannawuda pulul lesa balaya bedaharimak thahawuru karannawuda  yanadi washayen sandahan kara ,“shri lankawasi janathawa wu api apage swairi wyawasthadayaka balaya kriyathmaka kirimehi la me aandukrama wyawastha prathisanshodhanaya karamha”meyin pahadili wanne janathawagen labagath janawaramak nomathiwa nawa wyawasthawak gena eemata katayuthu kara athi bawayi.
